name: BridgePort Networks
overview: BridgePort Networks, Inc. develops fixed-mobile convergence applications. The company provides MobileVoIP applications and solutions to telecommunications service providers. It provides infrastructure software that bridges mobile and voice over IP (VoIP) services with a single phone number; MobileIGNITE, a mobile to VoIP roaming solution for communications service providers; and the NomadicONE Network Convergence Gateway extends identity phone number services over multiple access networks, including mobile, cable, DSL, Wi-Fi, and other broadband networks. The company offers Dual-mode Handover, Mobile Business, Mobile IP-Centrex, and Mobile IP-PBX applications, which are designed to be used and integrated with users’ current applications for communications. It serves mobile providers, integrated providers, broadband providers, and MVNO providers. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois. As of February 1, 2008, BridgePort Networks, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of CounterPath Corporation.

funding_rounds.source_description: BridgePort Networks Raises an Additional $13 Million in Venture Capital Funding.

acquisition.source_description: CounterPath Announces Strategic Acquisition of BridgePort Networks
